title: Ep 68: How To Create a Purpose Driven Economy
description:
How can we create a purpose driven Economy?
What tools will we be needing? What will these tools look like?
Lisa and Griff discuss!

Timestamps :
Intro : 0:00
Overview - 0:44
How does bottom up participatory economies play out in emerging economies with low literacy rate? - 10:32
Dashboard Introduction - 12:58
What is CV? - 16:05
The commons Stack Hatch - 22:59
Quick Summary : 32:58
How can one participate in TEC? - 42:19
